snippet.title: Haunted PS1 Demo Disc: Spectral Mall - Trailer
snippet.description:
https://hauntedps1.itch.io/demo-disc-spectral-mall

HAUNTED DEMO DISC SPECTRAL MALL

In the before-times, the mall stood king among shopping locales. People flocked to them, purchasing ravenously to calm their quaint cares. But now, the customers are all dead, and the corporate catacombs stand silent, customers only by roaches and rats.

Now, murmurs linger in every room. Brave or foolish souls have returned curiously to wander these skeletons of consumerism, and now, whisper of a ghastly change: Storefronts peddling wares that they do not contain, ads that flicker only in the corner of one's eye, and distant footsteps, diffused in a hungry emptiness.

Your town had one such mall. Taller now, you find yourself standing before it in the gloom. Lights flicker from within, tinny music emanates from disconnected speakers. And you know:

WHEN THERE'S NO MORE ROOM IN HELL
THE DEMOns WILL WALK THE MALL!

18 FREE DEMOS IN ONE PACKAGE

Download the Demo Disc: Spectral Mall at: 
https://hauntedps1.itch.io/demodisc2022

[Press kit:]

HPS1 on Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/hauntedps1

Trailer by Amos Sorri 
https://twitter.com/AmosSorri

with music by Shirobon x Jason Page
https://twitter.com/shirobon
https://twitter.com/I_Am_JPage

PLAY THE MALL
